subject: Re: [junit] Will someone please respond?
msgSnippet: ... Good chance it got lost.  This is a users list, so you can t expect everyone to know how to answer questions that are not mainstream. I know I haven t seen
messageBody:
lchalupa wrote:

> Would someone please take a look at a posting from me on the JUNIT group a two days ago.
> It concerns how to test a method that uses jOptionPane. I got one reply.


Good chance it got lost. This is a users list, so you can't expect everyone to know how
to answer questions that are not mainstream.

I know I haven't seen your question.


>
> In the meantime, what else got a response? Well, we seem to have time to respond to trivial subjects and partake
> in what is nothing short of mental masturbation and ignore substantive questions that require some effort.
> I think I have read about 30 messages about getters and setters that sounds more like a pissing contest. And then there is the chatter about one piece of spam. How many worthless messages did this "spam" generate? Boy we nailed that one didn't we?



Hmmm. That inspires people to help. riiigghht.


>
> If you need someone to chat with, get a dog. I got one, he just doesn't know java/junit...yet.
>
> Sorry for the vent but I grow tired of groping in the dark.


Understandable, maybe you should repost your question.


>
> Thanks for your help.
>
> Lee Chalupa
>
>
>
>
